item.hss.greatsword.tooltip.shift.line1: The blade of the Hollowed. The embodiment of the brittle cold.
item.hss.greatsword.tooltip.shift.line2: Made with the purest of cryosteels, able to resist any amount of heat.
item.hss.greatsword.tooltip.shift.line3: Press [Shift + Right-click] to shatter the blade launching
item.hss.greatsword.tooltip.shift.line4: cryosteel shards in all directions. The blade will slowly
item.hss.greatsword.tooltip.shift.line5: piece itself back together, however, the hilt is fragile.
